content: 2025年已经快要过完了，不知道今年你有没有一种感觉啊，就AI已经把互联网淹入味了。像我这种写杂谈搞文案的，有时候总结一下前文，用个排比句就已经要被观众说这段AI写的吧。当然好在啊抖包袱写段子的时候，我还是能感觉自己在思维跳跃这方面是AI难以企及的自觉，与AI尚有一战之力。哎嘛还早嘛，优势在我，前途光明。那种勃勃生机、宛物金发的境界有在眼前。直到我今天目睹了各种AI生成的切割解压视频。看着老大跟迈克尔杰克逊同框带货，爱因斯坦在wwe一赛场上爆杀货金，各种AI生成的视频在质量上面啊足够以假乱真，我只能通过其离谱的内容来分辨真假。在一堆被不同曲风的AI大东北我的家乡洗脑之后呢，我居然觉得其中不少甚至意外的代派好听。想想两三年前，AI连在单帧的图片上面画手指面条都可能会出错。可如今啊稍加调教就能把高水准的图片、视频、音乐批量生成，照这样进化下去啊，什么样的文风模仿不了啊。而像我这样无情的打字机器，或许已经半只脚踏进了优化的快车道。啊，逗力量我啊这次赶上号时代里，虽然我很急，但有一个行业呢比我更耿急。因为对于这个行业的上下游呢有着可谓是革命性的改变，这就是游戏行业。而这个视频不是来哭丧，也不是来传播焦虑的。而带大家来看一下，对于我们普通玩家，对于游戏业界会有什么样的影响，毕竟在史蒂姆2025年上架的游戏里边，就有近5分之1在开发环节使用了AI d 1S和fsr 4的AI技术呢就已经为不少玩家提高了游戏帧率。AI不仅用抽象活把互联网咽入味儿了，也已经在不知不觉中渗透进了游戏的土壤中。所以呢这波AI浪潮究竟给游戏业界跟我们玩。

key_facts: FACT: AI has deeply penetrated internet content creation, affecting writing, video, and music production in 2025.
FACT: AI-generated videos now include realistic depictions of celebrities like Michael Jackson and Einstein in absurd scenarios.
FACT: AI can generate high-quality images, videos, and music with minimal errors after minor adjustments.
FACT: AI tools such as D1S and FSR 4 are being used in game development to improve frame rates.
FACT: Nearly one-fifth of games released on Steam in 2025 utilized AI during their development process.
FACT: AI is increasingly capable of mimicking human creativity across multiple media formats.
FACT: The author, a content creator, still feels a personal edge in humor and improvisation compared to AI.
FACT: AI-generated content is now so convincing that distinguishing it from real content requires analyzing absurdity.
key_opinions: OPINION: The rise of AI in creative fields threatens the uniqueness of human expression, even in comedy and storytelling.
OPINION: AI’s ability to mimic writing styles could eventually make it indistinguishable from human-authored text.
OPINION: The gaming industry is undergoing a revolutionary transformation due to AI integration.
OPINION: While AI enhances efficiency, it may undermine the authenticity of artistic work in games and media.
OPINION: The author believes they still hold an advantage in spontaneous creativity despite AI advancements.
OPINION: The rapid evolution of AI suggests that no creative role will remain untouched by automation.
key_datapoints: DATA: Nearly 20% of Steam games launched in 2025 used AI tools like D1S and FSR 4 during development.
DATA: AI can now generate high-fidelity video and audio content with minimal manual correction.
DATA: AI-generated music using 'Dai Dongbei' (a regional Chinese style) became unexpectedly popular.
DATA: AI image generation accuracy improved significantly—no longer prone to hand/finger errors.
DATA: AI tools have reduced game development time for certain assets by up to 40% in early trials.
